summary: This module is an example script that demonstrates how to set up, configure, and run a RadTTS text‑to‑speech model using NVIDIA NeMo. It includes utilities for preparing model weights, freezing and unfreezing layers, and orchestrates training or inference through a main entry point with experiment management and logging callbacks.
business_intent: Provide developers with a ready‑to‑use reference for training or fine‑tuning RadTTS speech synthesis models, enabling rapid development of TTS applications and facilitating experimentation with model weight management.
